rukus.text: Allah Taalaa chahata hai kay tumharay wastay khoob khol ker biyan keray aur tumhen tum say pehlay kay (nek) logon ki raah per chalaye aur tumhari tauba qabool keray aur Allah Taalaa janney wala hikmat wala hai
Aur Allah chahata hai kay tumhari tauba qabool keray aur jo log khuwaishaat kay pairoo hain woh chahtay hain kay tum iss say boht door hatt jao
Allah chahta hai kay tum say takhfeef ker dey kiyon kay insan kamzor peda kiya gaya hai

Aey eman walo! Apney aapas kay maal na jaeez tareeqay say mat khao magar yeh kay tumhari aapas ki raza mandi say ho khareed-o-farokht aur apney aap ko qatal na kero yaqeenan Allah Taalaa tum per nihayat meharban hai
Aur jo shaks yeh (na farmaniyan) sirkashi aur zulm say keray ga to un qarib hum uss ko aag mein dakhil keren gay. Aur yeh Allah per aasan hai
Agar tum unn baray gunahon say bachtay raho gay jin say tum ko mana kiya jata hai to hum tumharay chotay gunah door ker den gay aur izzat aur buzrugi ki jagah dakhil keren gay

Aur uss cheez ki aarzoo na kero jiss kay baees Allah Taalaa ney tum mein say baaz ko baaz per buzrugi di hai. Mardon kay uss mein say hissa hai jo unhon ney kamaya aur aurton kay liye uss mein say hain jo unhon ney kamaya aur Allah Taalaa say uss ka fazal maango yaqeenan Allah her cheez ka janney wala hai

Maa baap ya qarabat daar jo chor maren uss kay waris hum ney her shaks kay muqarrar ker diye hain aur jin say tum ney apney haathon mohaeeda kiya hai unhen unn ka hissa do haqeeqatan Allah Taalaa her cheez per hazir hai
